attributes.action: make Sony to un-merge the Official Playstation Portable and European Playstation forums.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With only a couple of weeks notice Sony decided to let the members of it's forums know that the PSP forums and EU Playstation forums were to be merged. On 15th February 2007, this procedure began. Now, the United Rebels Allliance of the Official PSP Community, would like Sony to undo this merge with the power of Tony Blair.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
